entry.string: git config --global user.email jenkins@gosmartlog.com git config --global user.name jenkins git clone https://${BITBUCKET_USERNAME}:${BITBUCKET_PASSWORD}@bitbucket.org/smartlogtms/devops-deployment-stm2.5.git cd devops-deployment-stm2.5 sed -i 's+744004065806.dkr.ecr.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/smartlog-optimization.*+744004065806.dkr.ecr.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/smartlog-optimization@sha256:ad5620ae811501074a1ee9bf6213f5c0ddb80a63aa06f97efaa7b104f646620d+g' ./super-vrp/master/.argocd-source.yaml git add ./super-vrp/master/.argocd-source.yaml for file in ./super-vrp/master/deploy*.yaml; do sed -i "s/\(date:\s*\)'[^']*'/\1'1680576694'/" "$file";git add "$file";done
